text: Gongchen Tower was a historical monument located in the ancient city of Weishan in the Chinese province of Yunnan.600-year-old tower destroyed by fire in Yunnan CNTV English The Gongchen tower was a city gate tower. It was built in 1390 during the Ming Dynasty. Built in wood, on January 3, 2015 the tower was burnt completely. ==References== Category:History of China Category:1390 establishments Category:Establishments in China Category:14th-century buildings and structures Category:Yunnan Category:14th-century establishments in Asia
title: Gongchen Tower
